outline:
1. to lack, be without, decrease, be lacking, have a need
    1. (Qal)
      1. to lack
      2. to be lacking
      3. to diminish, decrease
    2. (Piel) to cause to lack
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to be lacking
kjv_def: be abated, bereave, decrease, (cause to) fail, (have) lack, make lower, want.
strongs_def: to lack; by implication, to fail, want, lessen
